author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
CCTV footage received

The police are studying CCTV footage from cameras in Udhagamandalam Town to identify the three persons who were seen boarding the car belonging to taxi driver Ethiraj (62) who was found murdered in his car on Thadagam Road in the city on Monday morning.

Senior police officers said that they are yet to identify them. A special team was at Udhagamandalam for the second day on Tuesday to quiz other taxi drivers.
title: Police study CCTV footage to find murderers
